description: Silky, rich Vegan Pumpkin Caramel Sauce that takes only 5 minutes to make. It's so ridiculously easy & is just full of sweet pumpkin deliciousness! Be prepared to want to eat it on literally everything.......
keywords: pumpkin caramel sauce, vegan caramel sauce, vegan pumpkin caramel
name: Vegan Pumpkin Caramel Sauce
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup (100 grams) dark brown sugar (, or coconut sugar)
2 tablespoons cashew or almond butter (, or seed butter for nut-free)
2 tablespoons plant milk (more if you want to thin it a bit more)
1 tablespoon vegan butter (, or coconut oil (omit to make oil-free)

recipeInstructions.text: Put the sugar, water and salt into a small pan and warm over medium heat. When it starts to bubble remove from the heat.
Add the nut butter and give it a good stir, smushing the nut butter in until combined. You can pop it back over low heat while you do this as it helps it combine.

Next add the pumpkin puree, milk, vegan butter, and pumpkin spice. You can melt the vegan butter first or add it solid. Stir briskly (until the butter melts if it went in solid), and everything is smooth and combined. Leave it thick or add a little more milk to thin if you prefer.
Remove from the heat and transfer to a jar or container.

video.description: Silky, creamy & rich Vegan Pumpkin Caramel Sauce that takes only 5 minutes to make! It’s so ridiculously easy & is just full of sweet pumpkin deliciousness! Be prepared to want to eat it on literally everything…….
video.name: Vegan Pumpkin Caramel Sauce
